verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
You alone we worship; and upon You, we call for help.
Guide us along the straight path.

verses.verseString: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: The path of those You have blessed, not of those with anger on them, nor of the misguided.
